name: Pokémon Let's Go Pikachu!
overview: Relive the world of Pokémon Let's Go Pikachu by Nintendo Switch with this Make in GBA with many more mechanical! This game is a reinvention of Pokémon Let's Go for Game Boy Advance that corrects errors like you can fight with Pokémon to capture them and also add Pokémon from other generations. The game is in update and to know more you can go see Kevin PokeFan's channel
